page.title: Feedback & Ideas
page.subtitle: Share your ideas, report bugs, and vote on suggestions

submit.title: Submit Feedback
submit.dialogDescription: Fill out the form below to share your feedback or report an issue.

error.title: Error
error.message: Failed to submit feedback. Please try again.

edit.title: Edit Feedback
edit.dialogDescription: Update the title or description of your feedback.

success.title: Feedback updated
success.message: Your feedback has been updated successfully.

error.title: Error
error.message: Failed to update feedback. Please try again.

delete.title: Delete Feedback
delete.description: Are you sure you want to delete "{{title}}"? This action cannot be undone.

error.title: Error
error.message: Failed to delete feedback. Please try again.

list.empty: No feedback found. Be the first to share your ideas!
